heading.motto: EternalCode is a fantastic community of developers!

about.title: About ðŸŽ‰
about.p1: We are a team of programmers with many years of experience, offering a lot of services related to the IT industry!
about.p2: A close-knit team is what sets us apart, we are a pioneer of this type of service in the market. Among other things, we offer help with games, Linux & Windows servers. support related to the choice of hosting, security of server machines and we love to share our programming knowledge!
about.p3: Do you need something more? Or maybe you want us to do a top-notch design for you on commission? We can accomplish everything without much difficulty! We are open to any type of cooperation!

about-us.desc1: Our open source organization consists of eight IT enthusiasts, including several experienced programmers. Our main area of work is Minecraft plugins written in Java and projects in other languages such as PHP and HTML. We have opened several repositories on GitHub, which are constantly being developed and improved to provide the best possible Minecraft experience for users.
about-us.desc1short: Our open source organization consists of nine IT enthusiasts, including several experienced programmers.
about-us.desc2: As an open source organization, we value openness and collaboration. We often sit on Discord, giving advice and sharing knowledge about creating Minecraft servers. We want to help other developers and Minecraft enthusiasts develop their projects and achieve success in this field.
about-us.desc2short: We have opened several repositories on GitHub that are constantly being developed and improved to provide the best possible experience for Minecraft users.
about-us.desc3: Thanks to our openness and commitment, our organization is constantly growing and becoming more and more known in the Minecraft community and among open source developers. We are proud of our work and always strive to provide high-quality solutions for our users.
about-us.desc3short: We often sit on Discord, giving advice and sharing knowledge about Minecraft server creation.
about-us.desc4: In addition to working on open source projects, our members also value their free time and entertainment. We often play Minecraft and Fortnite to relax and enjoy playing together. Moreover, we like to play Sons of the Forest and Witcher, as well as watch anime and other movies to broaden our horizons and draw inspiration for creating our projects.
about-us.desc4short: We often play Minecraft and Fortnite for relaxation and to enjoy the game together. In addition, we enjoy playing Sons of the Forest and The Witcher, as well as watching anime and other movies to broaden our horizons and draw inspiration for our projects.

skills.title: Our magic powers!
skills.java: In our lineup you will find many programmers specializing in Java!
skills.php: Do you need a proprietary Itemshop? We can do a professional back-end!
skills.javascript: You can order professional applications and discord bots in JavaScript from us!
skills.linux: We will configure a Dedicated/VPS Server specifically for you, install database and panels etc.

projects.title: Our projects
projects.subtitle: Our projects are not only our services, but also our hobby! We offer many open source products!
